name: Midnight Metro (OKSoft, Kyllogrm, megsumm, iamjsk10)
description:
Midnight Metro

Ever stay too late on the metro? We know the feeling. In Midnight Metro, you play as an unsuspecting person who misses the last train. All seems fine until you hear a growling behind you. Can you survive the night? 

Dodge, hide, do what you must in order to hold out from imminent death. Play with your friends to see who survives the longest!

Directions: Use WASD or Arrow keys and mouse to move and look around. Hold shift to sprint.

WARNING: Our monster boy moves fast, make sure you're prepared to RUN
